title: feat: auto-install OpenClaw and auto-onboard in setup script
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: OpenClaw setup in a pinch
gist.blurb: We've streamlined the OpenClaw experience! The setup script now handles installation and onboarding automatically, making it easier than ever to get started.
gist.summary: The setup script now automatically installs OpenClaw via npm and handles the full onboarding process, reducing the setup flow from three steps to two.
gist.impact: Users can now get OpenClaw up and running with a single command, eliminating manual configuration steps.
gist.visual_concept: OpenClaw suggests a crab mascot. The scene should depict the Pollinations Bee and a cute pixel art crab working together to build something effortlessly, symbolizing the automated setup.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot high-fiving a cute red pixel art crab (OpenClaw) next to a neatly built sandcastle. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
